attributes.action: Investigate the Cafcass - Coram partnership as we believe this to be a "Conflict of Interest" and can not possibly be classed as in the "Best Interest of the Child".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cafacass was initiated to safeguard and protect all Children's interests involved in Family Legal System.
Law dictates them to be independent of all Courts, Social Services, Local Authorities and all child related agencies.
The partnership with Coram, the UK's 3rd largest adoption agency in addition to Coram's involvement with the Drug and Alcohol Court system make this a total "Conflict of Interest".
Coram also have financial interest's in Fostering, Child research and many other Child related agencies and this situation requires immediate investigation.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for direct communication with the Department for Children, Schools and Familiies
www.dcsf.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
